actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to commend the Women's Track Team of Louisiana State University (L.S.U.) for winning the 1993 National Collegiate Athletic Association Outdoor Track Championship, and for other achievements over the past seven years.

summary.text: Authorizes Darin Schroeder, an employee on the staff of Senator Feingold, and such other employees from whom testimony may be necessary to testify and to produce records in the case of United States v. George C. Matthews, except concerning matters for which a privilege should be asserted. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent such employees in connection with their testimony.

titles.title: A resolution to commend the Women's Track Team of Louisiana State University (L.S.U.) for winning the 1993 National Collegiate Athletic Association Outdoor Track Championship, and for other achievements over the past seven years.
